info: This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves by 20%
Boosts the power of Normal-type moves by 10% when held.
Its a combustible fuel that boost the power of Fire-type moves by 20%
It doubles any prize money received if the holding Pokemon joins a battle.
It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokemon encounter without fail.
This tough scale boosts the power of Dragon-type moves by 10%
This Belt Boosts the power of Fighting-type moves by 20%
When inflicts damage, there is a 10% chance that target also flinch.
It casts a glare that lowers the opposing Pokemon accuracy by 10%
Its a silver powder that will boost the power of Bug-type moves by 20%
Its a metallic film that can boost the power of Steel-type moves by 20%

Boosts the power of Normal-type moves by 20% when held.
This light, sharp claw lets the bearer has 20% chance to move first.
The holders HP is restored by 1/16 of is max HP every turn during battle.
Confuses the holder and raises Its Attack by 1 stages.
